getAnalysisInfo

protected java.util.Vector<java.lang.Object> getAnalysisInfo()
Returns analysis properties. The sequence of information is; name (String), analysis type (int), boundary cases (String[]), solver (String), eigenvalues (double[]), natural frequencies (double[]), cyclic frequencies (double[]), periods (double[]).

Specified by:
getAnalysisInfo in class Analysis
Returns:
Vector storing the analysis properties.

Parameters:

assembleMass

private void assembleMass(Mat mSystem)
Assembles system mass matrix. The system mass matrix is assumed to be diagonal (lumped).

Parameters:
mSystem - System mass matrix.

assembleStiffness

private void assembleStiffness(Mat kSystem)
Assembles system stiffness matrix. Homogeneous Dirichlet boundaries are imposed during the assembly of system stiffness matrix.

Parameters:
kSystem - System stiffness matrix.

computeHalfBandWidth

private int computeHalfBandWidth()
Computes and returns half-bandwidth of the system stiffness matrix.

Returns:
The half-bandwidth of the system stiffness matrix.
